actives.name: Niacinamide
actives.mechanism: Cosmetic support at the keratinocyte interface (PAR‑2) to reduce the look of uneven tone while supporting barrier lipids.
actives.mech: Cosmetic support at the keratinocyte interface (PAR‑2) to reduce the look of uneven tone while supporting barrier lipids.

actives.name: Tranexamic Acid
actives.mechanism: Cosmetic support around the plasmin pathway for a more even-looking tone.
actives.mech: Cosmetic support around the plasmin pathway for a more even-looking tone.

actives.name: Alpha‑Arbutin
actives.mechanism: Acts at the tyrosinase step to support a more uniform appearance.
actives.mech: Acts at the tyrosinase step to support a more uniform appearance.

actives.name: Kojic Dipalmitate
actives.mechanism: Oil-soluble kojic derivative acting at the tyrosinase step; oxidation-stable in anhydrous/emulsified systems.
actives.mech: Oil-soluble kojic derivative acting at the tyrosinase step; oxidation-stable in anhydrous/emulsified systems.

actives.name: Licorice Root
actives.mechanism: Glabridin‑rich botanical used for a calmer, more uniform look.
actives.mech: Glabridin‑rich botanical used for a calmer, more uniform look.

actives.name: Hyaluronic Acid 4D
actives.mechanism: Multi‑weight HA binds water at the surface to plump the feel of skin and enhance comfort.
actives.mech: Multi‑weight HA binds water at the surface to plump the feel of skin and enhance comfort.

actives.name: Gamma‑PGA
actives.mechanism: High‑MW poly‑γ‑glutamate supports lasting hydration and a smoother feel.
actives.mech: High‑MW poly‑γ‑glutamate supports lasting hydration and a smoother feel.

actives.name: Panthenol
actives.mechanism: Humectant and conditioner supporting a comfortable, supple feel.
actives.mech: Humectant and conditioner supporting a comfortable, supple feel.

actives.name: Ceramides + Cholesterol
actives.mechanism: Replenishes lipid matrix to reduce water loss and improve resilience.
actives.mech: Replenishes lipid matrix to reduce water loss and improve resilience.

actives.name: Squalane + Emollients
actives.mechanism: Light emollients soften and improve glide for sensorial comfort.
actives.mech: Light emollients soften and improve glide for sensorial comfort.

actives.name: Ectoin
actives.mechanism: Extremolyte that helps stabilize water structures and supports comfort under heat, dryness, pollution.
actives.mech: Extremolyte that helps stabilize water structures and supports comfort under heat, dryness, pollution.

actives.name: THD Ascorbate
actives.mechanism: Lipid‑soluble antioxidant supporting a brighter, more radiant appearance.
actives.mech: Lipid‑soluble antioxidant supporting a brighter, more radiant appearance.

actives.name: Ferulic + Tocopherols
actives.mechanism: Phenolic antioxidant that supports stability and complements vitamin antioxidants in the oil phase.
actives.mech: Phenolic antioxidant that supports stability and complements vitamin antioxidants in the oil phase.

actives.name: Mixed Tocopherols
actives.mechanism: Antioxidant support to defend surface lipids from oxidative stress.
actives.mech: Antioxidant support to defend surface lipids from oxidative stress.

actives.name: CoQ10
actives.mechanism: Supports defense of surface lipids from oxidative stress for a comforted look.
actives.mech: Supports defense of surface lipids from oxidative stress for a comforted look.

actives.name: Bakuchiol
actives.mechanism: Retinol‑alternative used for a smoother look and bouncier feel.
actives.mech: Retinol‑alternative used for a smoother look and bouncier feel.

actives.name: GHK‑Cu
actives.mechanism: Cosmetic peptide used for a smoother, more refined look over time.
actives.mech: Cosmetic peptide used for a smoother, more refined look over time.

actives.name: Argireline
actives.mechanism: Peptide targeting the look of expression lines for a smoother appearance around dynamic areas.
actives.mech: Peptide targeting the look of expression lines for a smoother appearance around dynamic areas.
